DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to examine the association between ideal cardiovascular health, diet and other lifestyles, biological risk factors, either well-established or emergent, and the risk of frailty in older adults, throughout different waves (2008-10, 2012 and 2015 -16).
DOC.brief_title: Study on Cardiovascular Health, Nutrition and Frailty in Older Adults in Spain
DOC.criteria: Noninstitutionalized Spanish resident 60 years and over
